issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: FSNamesystem#addErasureCodingPolicies should call checkNameNodeSafeMode() to ensure Namenode is not in safemode

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: FSNamesystem#removeErasureCodingPolicy should call checkNameNodeSafeMode() to ensure Namenode is not in safemode
fields.summary: When Namenode is in safemode,may not allowed to remove an user's erasure coding policy
